## Cross sectional studies

- David A Savitz, Gregory A Wellenius, [Can Cross-Sectional Studies Contribute to Causal Inference? It Depends](https://academic.oup.com/aje/advance-article-abstract/doi/10.1093/aje/kwac037/6539984), American Journal of Epidemiology, 2022.      

  **Summary:** Argues that cross-sectional studies are not necessarily all bad. Presents three important considerations when interpreting/conducting cross-sectional studies but doesn't really go into any detail about how to interpret numerical estimates of such studies. 
  
- Hudson JI, Pope HG Jr, Glynn RJ. [The cross-sectional cohort study: an underutilized design](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15824552/), Epidemiology, 2005
